name: Dynamic Duos: How design pairing helps Zendesk make better products [Slides]
description:
Your company is growing. Your designers live all over the globe. You’ve been working remotely for what feels like 237 months now. Sound familiar? At Zendesk, like everywhere else, connection has never been more important. Enter design pairing, the always collaborative, often vulnerable, and occasionally messy process that’s helped Zendesk Design level up and stay connected during ~these unprecedented times~. Hear why design pairing works and how it can help you:


  • Escape your echo chamber
  • Build strong connections
  • Make your work better (and get it done faster)
